game.name: Five Nights At Monkeys: Flat Mode
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud
game.shortDescription: Five Nights At Monkeys: Flat Mode is a flat screen horror experience where every night is different. Survive roaming monsters, manage tricky power systems, and face sudden jumpscares across forests, canyons, cities, and dark mines.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Five Nights At Monkeys: Flat Mode is a flat screen horror experience where every night is different. Survive roaming monsters, manage tricky power systems, and face sudden jumpscares across forests, canyons, cities, and dark mines.
